Services & Pricing

1.Web Development

Summary: Craft stunning websites tailored to your clients’ needs. From sleek portfolios to robust e-commerce platforms, I’ve got you covered.

Details: Custom designs, responsive layouts, SEO optimization, and seamless user experiences and secure.
Pricing: Starting at low as Ksh 5k $75 (varies based on complexity).

2. Graphic designing

Summary: ideas into visual masterpieces. Logos, banners, brochures—I’ll make your brand stand out.

Details: Logo creation, branding materials, social media graphics, and print-ready files.
Pricing: Starts as low from Ksh 500 (depends on project scope).

3. Networking

Summary: Keep businesses connected. Reliable networks, secure setups, and smooth communication.

Details: Network design, setup, troubleshooting, and maintenance.
Pricing: Custom quotes based on requirements.

4.Soft skills

Summary: Enhance professional profiles. I’ll craft compelling CVs and polish essays to perfection. Tech gremlins? Fear not! I’ll diagnose and fix software glitches, OS installations, and more.

Details: Tailored CVs highlighting skills and achievements. Essay editing for clarity and impact.Details: Windows installations, software updates, hardware diagnostics.
Pricing: CVs from $3, essay editing from $7. troubleshooting Hourly rate, starting at $7.
